name: BAMBOO ELEPHANT
slogan: We’re transforming the approach to education in healthcare in the UK

team.name: K Siva
team.bioHtml: Experienced Project Manager in Banking and Technology.

jobs.title: Product Demonstrator
jobs.description:
We’re transforming the approach to education in healthcare in the UK and rebuilding our front-end system used by health professionals.  We’re an early stage health tech startup based in London, looking for a highly motivated product demonstrator to visit multiple dental health centers around south of England to demonstrate our product.


What you would do:
•Flexible working, no fixed office.
•Paid on contractual/ site visit basis + travel.
•Visit health centers in the south of England to do lunch and learn after our product is installed on their premises. 
•Handle the whole demo process and helping all members of the clinic understand our product and able to use the product.
•Start – Immediate
•Rate – negotiable fixed rate for lunch and learn demo’s (45-90 minutes excluding travel) 

Desirable skills:
Experience in:
•Healthcare
•Strong organisational and interpersonal skills.
•Previous experience working within a target driven environment is desirable
